channel.title: Protip on OJ's Perspective
channel.description: Recent content in Protip on OJ's Perspective

item.title: Meaning
item.description: Life is way too short to be working on boring, uninteresting or meaningless stuff. Get out there and do what you love. Screw working for the dollar on something that you don’t enjoy. Don’t study in a field that doesn’t inspire you just because you got the marks or because people expect you to. Don’t do what you’ve always done just because it’s easy. Chase your passion. Love your work.
